@VoteHollandSF It's nearly beyond belief, isn't it? You'd think the next generation coming through would be different but no, same old crap.
@pcgstl So for Emma Pengelly to tell people it isn't all that bad here because we don't execute or throw LGBT people in prison, disgusting.
@pcgstl That type of language drives people (especially youths) to despair and depression and ultimately suicide in some cases.
@pcgstl When a political party is comprised of people who call gay relationships an abomination, we have a serious problem.
@pcgstl Political disagreement is all well and good but what we have here is a religious crusade to keep a minority group down.
@pcgstl Honestly, you don't see much exclusion? They shouldn't have to make themselves heard, they should be equal to everyone else.
@Sfeehan70Sarah It's time she locked it up again. Not going well at all.
@pcgstl By the way, to suggest that ALL LGBT suicides are a result of mental illness is completely unfounded and disgusting.
@pcgstl And you think exclusion and demonisation doesn't contribute to mental illness?
@VoteHollandSF Holocaust victims and then cried abuse when she was asked to explain her party stance on LGBT equality.
@VoteHollandSF If you take a look at her timeline now you'll see. Basically she got called out on her hypocritical remembrance of...
Conclusion, she either doesn't want to learn or is so indoctrinated by DUP that she can't. Either way it's totally depressing.
Emma Pengelly has no understanding of LGBT people who commit suicide because her party and others make them feel excluded from society.
